title: The Restaurant at Patowmack Farm
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A hilltop fine dining greenhouse restaurant with views of the Potomac River and surrounding countryside. Always offers a vegetarian menu. Chef can prepare a custom 100% vegan multi-course meal upon request with advance notice. Features organic seasonal ingredients from their own farm. Offers some vegan wines.
